verse.name: v1
verse.lines: On the east end of town, by the foot of the hill There's a chimney so tall, says Belfast Mill But there's no smoke at all comin' out of the stack For the mill has shut down, and it's never comin' back

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And the only tune I hear is the sound of the wind As she blows through the town, we then spin, we then spin

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There's no children playin' down the dark lonely streets For the mill has shut down, so quiet I can't sleep

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The mill has shut down, 'twas the only life I know Tell me where will I go, tell me where will I go

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Well I'm to old to work, and I'm too young to die Tell me where will I go, my family and I

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: At the east end of town, by the foot of the hill There's a chimney so tall, says Belfast Mill But there's no smoke at all comin' out of the stack For the mill has shut down, and it's never comin' back
